pbmtoxbm

Updated: 31 August 1988
Table Of Contents  

NAME

pbmtoxbm - convert a PBM image to an X11 bitmap  

SYNOPSIS

pbmtoxbm [pbmfile]  

DESCRIPTION

This program is part of Netpbm. pbmtoxbm reads a PBM image as input and produces an X11 bitmap as output.  

SEE ALSO

pbmtox10bm, xbmtopbm, pbm  

AUTHOR

Copyright (C) 1988 by Jef Poskanzer.
